text:
<@U048C858Y94> - there’s actually been a follow up, please have a look at this recording <https://www.loom.com/share/40e6bdf253794d0b9ee60fc1ac5b9dbf?sid=3eee29ff-4940-477d-a7a4-de999106b546>

The page opens properly with all the preferences checked, when clicking the Unsubscribe the preferences uncheck, but is it possible to have the Unsubscribe uncheck when the preferences are checked?

That’s interesting. What you want is how it’s supposed to work. I just checked my own preferences page and the Unsubscribe box gets unchecked as soon as I check one of the lists above it.

• Are you using a custom preferences page, or are you using the default one?
• Can more than one person replicate this behavior?
• Do you get the same thing if you try to do this in another browser like Firefox or Safari?

<@U048C858Y94>
• a default page with custom style
• Yes, another person had the same behaviour, she brought it to my attention
• same results in Safari
Not sure about this one. Unfortunately, this Slack is very quiet most of the time. I would reach out to customer support for this.
